sub-articles.subarticle: What is the purpose of this tool?
content: The purpose of this tool is to create examples of visualizations and tools that are commonly used to help traders analyze performance of a certain stock.
In this tool, you will find a variety of customizable options to view information about certain stocks, which include simple 5-day summaries, to article sentiment analyses.
This tool is not responsible for decisions made by the user, and it only serves to visualize existing information.
The core of this website is based on yFinance and BeautifulSoup4. Supplementary content listed here. Example test example test setetste et etetsetse tset;asef
You can see relative change as well as overall change here
